snippet.title: HeroesTD - Trailer - Mar 2022
snippet.description:
Are you looking for a Tower Defense game with creative, unique strategy gameplay, an Esport game that brings you to endless amazing battles in Hero Metaverse?

Welcome to HeroesTD - Top Free-To-Play Tower Defense Esport Game with a great number of players around the globe, earning high rating from gamers, streamers, and influencers, which is expected to be the new phenomenon in Tower Defense Esport Game Era. 

★ DOWNLOAD HEROESTD NOW!

★ PLAN YOUR STRATEGY, MAXIMIZE YOUR HERO’S POWER AND LEAD YOUR HEROES TO THE VICTORY:

Strategy is the most important thing in HeroesTD to maximize the power of the heroes. You will need to use your unique strategy to defend your tower and crush the forces of the opponent. 

Let’s build a team of 5 mightiest heroes and lead the greatest deck to victory in this epic Tower Defense game, which will keep you hooked for hours! You will need to think carefully about each Hero’s skills, items, runes, classes, and origins to mix and combine them to have the strongest team. Then you need to consider the Target Type (Strong, Weak, Front, Random), Attack Damage, Ability Power, Crowd Control ability, and so on. 

In HeroesTD, we have a lot for you to consider to build your best deck, so your gameplay style will not be the same as anyone else!

★ GAMEPLAY:

- More than 60 unique heroes with diverse skills and abilities
- Defend against endless waves of heroes and bosses.
- Collect Common, Rare, Epic and Legendary Heroes to merge and evolve your Heroes, allowing them to gain powerful and unique abilities!
- Impressive graphics & unique gameplay for a totally new kind of TD experience
- Diverse Game Mode: PvP, Coop, Challenge,...

★ GAME FEATURES:

- Robust Daily Quests and Merchant offerings.
- Ranking Leaderboard Season with great rewards for top tier players MONTHLY
- Periodically special events, tournaments, sales,...
- Warlord  & Commander System
- Ingame Emoji
- Referral
- VIP Zone
- Clan/ Guild Tournaments
- Active communities from different countries

★ GAME STORIES:

HeroesTD is created with a mysterious and enchanting universe, where players can not only enjoy the unique gameplay but can also uncover the hidden amazing stories in Heroes Metaverse.

HeroesTD provides up to more than 60 heroes with a great variety of Skills, Items, Runes, Items, Classes, and Origins. Each hero has its own interesting story behind their power, therefore, uncovering the story plot twist is also interesting besides playing game. HeroesTD allows players enjoy gameplay with a lot of great features, making their playtime more valuable. 

★ LET’S EXPERIENCE AND ENJOY MEMORABLE PLAYTIME WITH HEROESTD!
